oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bridges - Preview Drawing
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: bridges; Mississippi River; Harahan Bridge; Frisco Bridge; Memphis-Arkansas Bridge;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This drawn-to-scale picture appeared in the Press-Scimitar newspaper in 1948. It depicts the already existing Harahan and Frisco Bridges and the new still-unnamed bridge.
